**力量手套**（gauntlets of power，常缩写作**GoP**）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，属于[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## 生成

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")若在生成时携带[战锤](/wiki/%E6%88%98%E9%94%A4 "战锤")，则必定会获得一双力量手套。生成时不携带战锤的玩家怪物则有7⁄40（约17.5%）的概率获得力量手套[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

力量手套的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，穿戴时会将玩家的[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")设定为25，手套的[BUC](/index.php?title=BUC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "BUC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")不影响此效果。穿戴或脱下力量手套会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。使用[弓](/wiki/%E5%BC%93 "弓")射击时，该手套会赋予-2[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")惩罚[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。由于是金属材料制成，力量手套会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")。穿戴力量手套时，你不能[锻炼](/index.php?title=%E9%94%BB%E7%82%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "锻炼 (page does not exist)")你的力量，但你天生具有的力量值仍可以发生变化。

[雷神之锤](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E4%B9%8B%E9%94%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雷神之锤 (page does not exist)")只有在持有者力量为25时才能投掷，因此你需要穿戴力量手套才能投掷它。

穿戴力量手套的怪物的[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")攻击会造成额外的3～6点伤害，该增益不会作用于不能使用武器的怪物[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 策略

- *主条目：[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")*

力量能影响玩家的[携带容量](/index.php?title=%E6%90%BA%E5%B8%A6%E5%AE%B9%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "携带容量 (page does not exist)")、攻击命中的概率、近战攻击的伤害、投掷武器（不使用[发射器](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E5%99%A8 "发射器")）的伤害，以及除[弩箭](/wiki/%E5%BC%A9%E7%AE%AD "弩箭")外的发射物的射程。不过，如果你不是[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")，通过其他途径将力量提升到18/\*\*，也能获得差不多的增益效果。若力量已提升到此上限，你能从力量手套获得的额外加成就只包括携带容量的提升、发射物的射程和投掷雷神之锤的能力。

力量手套虽然并不值得特地花费[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")获取，也不是[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")必需，但属于值得长期使用的防具。虽然由金属制成，[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")可能也需要它们来提升自己的力量：穿戴力量手套，但不穿戴[长袍](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%8D "长袍")和其他金属防具的巫师在[智力](/index.php?title=%E6%99%BA%E5%8A%9B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "智力 (page does not exist)")为18时，施法的[失败率](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")仅有4%，智力为19或更高时仅有3%，属于可以接受的范围。

施法能力不那么强的角色穿戴该手套可能受到更高的惩罚，若要在战斗中使用法术就要使用其他的手套。反之，精于非魔法战斗的角色（如[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")）就更适合力量手套。力量为18/01或更高时，力量手套的加成会显得不那么重要，非精灵的角色也很容易将力量提升至这个水平。

对于打算后续替换掉力量手套的玩家而言，可以在主动或被动锻炼力量时（例如攻略[仓库番](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%93%E5%BA%93%E7%95%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "仓库番 (page does not exist)")的时候）脱下力量手套，除非这么做会大幅减弱战斗能力。

### 鉴定

力量手套穿戴或脱下时总是会自动鉴定，此外它们是唯一一种重30 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")的手套，因此也可利用重量鉴定。你还可以通过它的材料来将它和其他手套区分——由于是铁制物品，对力量手套使用[试金石](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%95%E9%87%91%E7%9F%B3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "试金石 (page does not exist)")会发出“喀喳，喀喳”的声音。

## 历史

力量手套首次于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。其对怪物的武器攻击的伤害加成特性于[NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1")加入[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Gauntlets_of_power/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), gauntlets of power set your strength to 18/\*\* and further modify it based on the gauntlets' enchantment, e.g. a +1 pair will give you 19 strength, while a -1 pair will give you 18/99. Valkyries can safely enchant gauntlets of power up to +7, which allows them to gain the 25 strength required to throw Mjollnir.

The [spinach](/wiki/Spinach "Spinach")-filled hidden chest behind the secret passage in the southwestern portion of [Grund's Stronghold](/wiki/Grund%27s_Stronghold "Grund's Stronghold") has a 1⁄3 chance of containing a cursed +1 pair of gauntlets of power.

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), power is an [object property](/wiki/Object_properties#Armor-specific_properties "Object properties") that gloves and other armor can have, and can occur on already-magical armor - a blessed, [greased](/wiki/Greased "Greased") and [fireproofed](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") +3 pair of [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") [gauntlets of dexterity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_dexterity "Gauntlets of dexterity") and power is perhaps the best [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") available for the gloves slot.

Monsters are capable of making wishes, and may wish for blessed, greased and fixed +3 gauntlets of power if they are not [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), gauntlets of power confer 1 base AC, 1 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and 25 strength while worn.

There are a few [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") pairs of gauntlets of power:

- [The Gauntlets of Spell Power](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Gauntlets_of_Spell_Power "DNetHack artifacts") are unaligned [silvered](/wiki/Silver "Silver") gauntlets of power that are made of iron (which harms elves, drow and vampires). While worn, they add silver damage to unarmed attacks, grant a +1 bonus to skill level for all spells without changing failure rates, doubles damage for beam and ray spells, and confer [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage").
- [The Premium Heart](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Premium_Heart "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned set of gauntlets of power that adds their enchantment to [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") as the [gauntlets of dexterity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_dexterity "Gauntlets of dexterity") do while worn, and can be enchanted safely to +7. They unlock the martial arts skill when given as a sacrifice gift. While worn, Premium Heart also confers +1 to-hit and double damage to unarmed attacks, give no additional spell failure penalty to [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk"), and unarmed attacks have a skill level in 20 chance of staggering the opponent - most of all, they gain an additional +1x damage multiplier for each status property afflicting the wearer.
- [The Godhands](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Godhands "DNetHack artifacts") are lawful [golden](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") gauntlets of power that set dexterity to 25 while worn and can be enchanted to +7. While worn, they also confer +1d20 to-hit and +1d10 damage to unarmed attacks, give no additional spell failure penalty to Monks, grant [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"), and deal extra damage when blessed or cursed: blessed Godhands deal +3d7 unholy damage to unholy-haters in addition to the base item's +2d9 unholy damage, while blessed Godhands deal +3d7 holy damage to holy-haters in addition to the base item's +1d20 holy damage.
- [The Grappler's Grasp](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Grappler.27s_Grasp "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned set of gauntlets of power that confers +1 to-hit and +1d6 damage while worn, and grabs monsters on a successful unarmed attack - while grabbed, monsters take at least one d6 of crushing damage each turn, with the amount dependent on skill level: 1d6 at Basic skill or lower, 2d6 at Skilled or Expert, and 3d6 at Master or higher, with +1d6 if you have the martial arts skill.
- [The Great Claws of Urdlen](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Great_Claws_of_Urdlen "DNetHack artifacts") are a chaotic set of gauntlets of power that serve as the [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for chaotic [gnome](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") characters, and enable them to train martial arts to Grand Master. While worn, they grant +1d10 to-hit and double damage to unarmed attacks, along with doubling the unarmed damage die to 1d8 and adding their enchantment to that damage. They also set [constitution](/wiki/Constitution "Constitution") to 25 while worn, can be used as a [digging tool](/wiki/Digging_tool "Digging tool"), and [invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") them causes an [earthquake](/index.php?title=Earthquake\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Earthquake (page does not exist)").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the [Gauntlets of Purity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_Purity "Gauntlets of Purity") are an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") pair of gauntlets of power made of silver.

Monsters are capable of making wishes as in GruntHack, and may wish for blessed erodeproofed gauntlets of power with an enchantment from +1 to +4 if they can wear them and are not strong.

Early [wishes](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for [illithid](/wiki/Illithid_\(starting_race\) "Illithid (starting race)") characters often include gauntlets of power to offset their low strength and carrying capacity, with [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") and [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood") as popular [choices of material](/wiki/Object_materials_\(EvilHack\) "Object materials (EvilHack)") due to being lighter and spellcaster-friendly. [Stone](/wiki/Stone "Stone") is also viable and even provides an extra point of [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") - though it is heavier, this is somewhat offset by keeping them worn where possible.

力量手套（gauntlets of power，常缩写作GoP）是NetHack中的一种手套类防具。它由铁制成，属于魔法防具，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
    • 3.1 鉴定
  • 4 历史

生成

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物若在生成时携带战锤，则必定会获得一双力量手套。生成时不携带战锤的玩家怪物则有7⁄40（约17.5%）的概率获得力量手套[2]。

描述

力量手套的基础AC加成为1，穿戴时会将玩家的力量设定为25，手套的BUC不影响此效果。穿戴或脱下力量手套会自动鉴定之。使用弓射击时，该手套会赋予-2命中惩罚[3]。由于是金属材料制成，力量手套会阻碍施法。穿戴力量手套时，你不能锻炼你的力量，但你天生具有的力量值仍可以发生变化。

雷神之锤只有在持有者力量为25时才能投掷，因此你需要穿戴力量手套才能投掷它。

穿戴力量手套的怪物的武器攻击会造成额外的3～6点伤害，该增益不会作用于不能使用武器的怪物[4]。

策略

主条目：力量

力量能影响玩家的携带容量、攻击命中的概率、近战攻击的伤害、投掷武器（不使用发射器）的伤害，以及除弩箭外的发射物的射程。不过，如果你不是精灵，通过其他途径将力量提升到18/**，也能获得差不多的增益效果。若力量已提升到此上限，你能从力量手套获得的额外加成就只包括携带容量的提升、发射物的射程和投掷雷神之锤的能力。

力量手套虽然并不值得特地花费许愿获取，也不是飞升套件必需，但属于值得长期使用的防具。虽然由金属制成，巫师可能也需要它们来提升自己的力量：穿戴力量手套，但不穿戴长袍和其他金属防具的巫师在智力为18时，施法的失败率仅有4%，智力为19或更高时仅有3%，属于可以接受的范围。

施法能力不那么强的角色穿戴该手套可能受到更高的惩罚，若要在战斗中使用法术就要使用其他的手套。反之，精于非魔法战斗的角色（如野蛮人）就更适合力量手套。力量为18/01或更高时，力量手套的加成会显得不那么重要，非精灵的角色也很容易将力量提升至这个水平。

对于打算后续替换掉力量手套的玩家而言，可以在主动或被动锻炼力量时（例如攻略仓库番的时候）脱下力量手套，除非这么做会大幅减弱战斗能力。

鉴定

力量手套穿戴或脱下时总是会自动鉴定，此外它们是唯一一种重30 aum的手套，因此也可利用重量鉴定。你还可以通过它的材料来将它和其他手套区分——由于是铁制物品，对力量手套使用试金石会发出“喀喳，喀喳”的声音。

历史

力量手套首次于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。其对怪物的武器攻击的伤害加成特性于NetHack 3.6.1加入[5]。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, gauntlets of power set your strength to 18/** and further modify it based on the gauntlets' enchantment, e.g. a +1 pair will give you 19 strength, while a -1 pair will give you 18/99. Valkyries can safely enchant gauntlets of power up to +7, which allows them to gain the 25 strength required to throw Mjollnir.

The spinach-filled hidden chest behind the secret passage in the southwestern portion of Grund's Stronghold has a 1⁄3 chance of containing a cursed +1 pair of gauntlets of power.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, power is an object property that gloves and other armor can have, and can occur on already-magical armor - a blessed, greased and fireproofed +3 pair of dragonhide gauntlets of dexterity and power is perhaps the best wish available for the gloves slot.

Monsters are capable of making wishes, and may wish for blessed, greased and fixed +3 gauntlets of power if they are not strong.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, gauntlets of power confer 1 base AC, 1 base DR and 25 strength while worn.

There are a few artifact pairs of gauntlets of power:

  • The Gauntlets of Spell Power are unaligned silvered gauntlets of power that are made of iron (which harms elves, drow and vampires). While worn, they add silver damage to unarmed attacks, grant a +1 bonus to skill level for all spells without changing failure rates, doubles damage for beam and ray spells, and confer half spell damage.
  • The Premium Heart is an unaligned set of gauntlets of power that adds their enchantment to dexterity as the gauntlets of dexterity do while worn, and can be enchanted safely to +7. They unlock the martial arts skill when given as a sacrifice gift. While worn, Premium Heart also confers +1 to-hit and double damage to unarmed attacks, give no additional spell failure penalty to Monks, and unarmed attacks have a skill level in 20 chance of staggering the opponent - most of all, they gain an additional +1x damage multiplier for each status property afflicting the wearer.
  • The Godhands are lawful golden gauntlets of power that set dexterity to 25 while worn and can be enchanted to +7. While worn, they also confer +1d20 to-hit and +1d10 damage to unarmed attacks, give no additional spell failure penalty to Monks, grant drain resistance, and deal extra damage when blessed or cursed: blessed Godhands deal +3d7 unholy damage to unholy-haters in addition to the base item's +2d9 unholy damage, while blessed Godhands deal +3d7 holy damage to holy-haters in addition to the base item's +1d20 holy damage.
  • The Grappler's Grasp is an unaligned set of gauntlets of power that confers +1 to-hit and +1d6 damage while worn, and grabs monsters on a successful unarmed attack - while grabbed, monsters take at least one d6 of crushing damage each turn, with the amount dependent on skill level: 1d6 at Basic skill or lower, 2d6 at Skilled or Expert, and 3d6 at Master or higher, with +1d6 if you have the martial arts skill.
  • The Great Claws of Urdlen are a chaotic set of gauntlets of power that serve as the crowning gift for chaotic gnome characters, and enable them to train martial arts to Grand Master. While worn, they grant +1d10 to-hit and double damage to unarmed attacks, along with doubling the unarmed damage die to 1d8 and adding their enchantment to that damage. They also set constitution to 25 while worn, can be used as a digging tool, and invoking them causes an earthquake.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the Gauntlets of Purity are an artifact pair of gauntlets of power made of silver.

Monsters are capable of making wishes as in GruntHack, and may wish for blessed erodeproofed gauntlets of power with an enchantment from +1 to +4 if they can wear them and are not strong.

Early wishes for illithid characters often include gauntlets of power to offset their low strength and carrying capacity, with bone and wood as popular choices of material due to being lighter and spellcaster-friendly. Stone is also viable and even provides an extra point of AC - though it is heavier, this is somewhat offset by keeping them worn where possible.

|cost=50 |weight=30 |material=铁 }} '''力量手套'''（gauntlets of power，常缩写作'''GoP'''）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[手套]]类[[防具]]。它由[[铁]]制成，属于[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|501|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == 在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]若在生成时携带[[战锤]]，则必定会获得一双力量手套。生成时不携带战锤的玩家怪物则有{{frac|7|40}}（约17.5%）的概率获得力量手套{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|289|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 力量手套的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，穿戴时会将玩家的[[力量]]设定为25，手套的{{cnlink|BUC}}不影响此效果。穿戴或脱下力量手套会[[自动鉴定]]之。使用[[弓]]射击时，该手套会赋予-2[[命中]]惩罚{{refsrc|src/dothrow.c|1571|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。由于是金属材料制成，力量手套会阻碍[[施法]]。穿戴力量手套时，你不能[[锻炼]]你的力量，但你天生具有的力量值仍可以发生变化。 [[雷神之锤]]只有在持有者力量为25时才能投掷，因此你需要穿戴力量手套才能投掷它。 穿戴力量手套的怪物的[[武器]]攻击会造成额外的3{{波浪线}}6点伤害，该增益不会作用于不能使用武器的怪物{{refsrc|src/mhitm.c|987|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|力量}} 力量能影响玩家的[[携带容量]]、攻击命中的概率、近战攻击的伤害、投掷武器（不使用[[发射器]]）的伤害，以及除[[弩箭]]外的发射物的射程。不过，如果你不是[[精灵（起始种族）|精灵]]，通过其他途径将力量提升到18/**，也能获得差不多的增益效果。若力量已提升到此上限，你能从力量手套获得的额外加成就只包括携带容量的提升、发射物的射程和投掷雷神之锤的能力。 力量手套虽然并不值得特地花费[[许愿]]获取，也不是[[飞升套件]]必需，但属于值得长期使用的防具。虽然由金属制成，[[巫师]]可能也需要它们来提升自己的力量：穿戴力量手套，但不穿戴[[长袍]]和其他金属防具的巫师在[[智力]]为18时，施法的[[施法#计算成功概率|失败率]]仅有4%，智力为19或更高时仅有3%，属于可以接受的范围。 施法能力不那么强的角色穿戴该手套可能受到更高的惩罚，若要在战斗中使用法术就要使用其他的手套。反之，精于非魔法战斗的角色（如[[野蛮人]]）就更适合力量手套。力量为18/01或更高时，力量手套的加成会显得不那么重要，非精灵的角色也很容易将力量提升至这个水平。 对于打算后续替换掉力量手套的玩家而言，可以在主动或被动锻炼力量时（例如攻略[[仓库番]]的时候）脱下力量手套，除非这么做会大幅减弱战斗能力。 === 鉴定 === 力量手套穿戴或脱下时总是会自动鉴定，此外它们是唯一一种重30 {{cnlink|aum}}的手套，因此也可利用重量鉴定。你还可以通过它的材料来将它和其他手套区分——由于是铁制物品，对力量手套使用[[试金石]]会发出“喀喳，喀喳”的声音。 == 历史 == 力量手套首次于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。其对怪物的武器攻击的伤害加成特性于[[NetHack 3.6.1]]加入{{refsrc|src/mhitm.c|920|nethack=3.6.1}}。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], gauntlets of power set your strength to 18/** and further modify it based on the gauntlets' enchantment, e.g. a +1 pair will give you 19 strength, while a -1 pair will give you 18/99.
